column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=We need to end the lock on this countries domestic and foreign policy that the military industrial complex , the international banks , multi-national corporations , big oil , and even Israel has on our country to the detriment of the people of America .
#Text=I am not anti-military , but I am totally against endless wars for the wealthy elite , going back to the Spanish American War .
#Text=We can have $ 1.00 a gallon gas ; I can do it .
#Text=This is America .

#Text=When all is said and done , I think that I will be a reasonable and informed choice for the millions of American voters who will not like to vote for either the Democrat or Republican in November .
#Text=I 'm qualified and ready to serve .
#Text=If elected , how would you handle America 's public school system ?
#Text=I retired out of the Michigan Public School system with over 23 years of service ; K-12 ; I can help bring our public schools to a higher level of achievement .
#Text=First , eliminate all illegal aliens from the system .
#Text=We have no duty or obligation to feed or educate them .
#Text=None what so ever .
#Text=They have help destroy most of our inner city public school systems .
#Text=They have stressed out our public schools and local school can not deal with them .

#Text=They do pay the taxes needed to support our schools and do n't greatly appreciate the free education they get ; also , we need to reduce by around 90 % the amount of Federal education money we collect and then send back to the states for education .
#Text=The huge amount of Federal paperwork is also stressing out our public schools and we need to end it .
#Text=Local school boards and the people they are responsible to are the best judge of what is needed ; this with state oversight , will help boost public school quality & education .
#Text=I support public school education , along with schools of choice and home schooling .
#Text=The Federal government has done little to increase the quality of education .
#Text=For the most part , it has been a waste of money .
#Text=How would you handle abortion ?
#Text=Push this issue back to the states .
#Text=I remember when the states controlled the issue of abortion , there was very little of it ; When the Federal government got involved , millions of the unborn died .
#Text=As President , I would not spend or authorized one red cent for abortion .
#Text=This is a state issue ; period .
#Text=There will always be some states that will allow it to some degree , but that is up to the people of that state to decide , not the federal government or Fed . Courts .
#Text=Do you think you have a good shot at winning the Constitution Party nomination ?
#Text=If so , do you think that you could be in the White House this time next year ?
